title: Magic in the Mountain: A Renegade Vale novella
description: Sara Clayton doesn't expect to find love when handsome Allon Armstrong shows up in Renegade Vale. She doesn't expect her brother, Bryce, to go missing, either--and she certainly doesn't expect to find out she is a witch.Never mind that she talks to ghosts.As the town falls under a spell from an energy vampire, Sara must embrace her powers, race deep into Renegade Mine and confront an ancient witch...because true love is all about making your own magic, right?Magic in the Mountain is the first novella in the Renegade Vale paranormal romance series, a clean and wholesome set of books with powerful punches of fun and adventure.
author: Gwen Bristol
